SEARCH
Package alexlewis9.shapes

Class Circle

java.lang.Object
alexlewis9.shapes.Shape
alexlewis9.shapes.Circle
public class Circle extends Shape
This shapes.Circle class represents a double precision circle that can be drawn using the Processing library.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class alexlewis9.shapes.Shape

    x, y

    Returns the diameter of the circle.

    Determines the equation of the circle in the form (x - h)^2 + (y - k)^2 = r^2, where (h, k) is the center and r is the radius.

  • Constructor Details

    • Circle

      public Circle()
      Initializes a default instance of a shapes.Circle object with all dimensions set to zero.

    • Circle

      public Circle(double x, double y, double diameter)
      Initializes new instance of a shapes.Circle object with given dimensions. The center of the circle is at x, y.
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of circle.
      y - Y-coordinate of circle.
      diameter - Diameter of circle.

    • Circle

      public Circle(double x, double y, double diameter, int r, int g, int b)
      Initializes new instance of a shapes.Circle object with given dimensions and color. The center of the circle is at x, y.
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of circle.
      y - Y-coordinate of circle.
      diameter - Diameter of circle.
      r - Red.
      g - Green.
      b - Blue.

    • Circle

      public Circle(double x, double y, double diameter, Color color)
      Initializes new instance of a shapes.Circle object with given dimensions and color. The center of the circle is at x, y.
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of circle.
      y - Y-coordinate of circle.
      diameter - Diameter of circle.
      color - Stroke color.

    • isPointInside

      public boolean isPointInside(double x, double y)
      Tests whether the point x, y is contained inside this circle.
      Specified by:
      isPointInside in class Shape
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of the point.
      y - Y-coordinate of the point.
      Returns:
      True if the point x, y is contained inside this circle, false otherwise.

    • draw

      public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
      Draws the circle to the given Processing PApplet. The center of the circle is at getX(),getY().
      Overrides:
      draw in class Shape
      Parameters:
      marker - The Processing PApplet on which to draw the shapes.Circle.
      Preconditions:
      The shapes.Circle will be drawn with attributes previously set on the given PApplet.
      Postconditions:
      Side effect - marker is set to: marker.stroke(r, g, b), marker.fill(r, g, b), marker.ellipseMode(PConstants.CENTER).

    • getBoundingRectangle

      public Rectangle getBoundingRectangle()
      Initializes a shapes.Rectangle object which is a bounding rectangle of the circle.
      Returns:
      The bounding shapes.Rectangle

    • getEquation

      public String getEquation()
      Determines the equation of the circle in the form (x - h)^2 + (y - k)^2 = r^2, where (h, k) is the center and r is the radius.
      Returns:
      The equation of the circle.
